auth/email-already-in-use: This email is already registered. Please sign in or use another email address.
auth/invalid-password: Invalid password. Please try another password.
auth/wrong-password: Wrong password. Please try another password or request a reset.
auth/internal-error: Unexpected internal error has occured. Please try again.
auth/expired-action-code: Your reset code is has expired. Please cancel this form and request another password reset.
auth/invalid-action-code: Your reset code is invalid. Please enter a correct reset code.
auth/invalid-email: Invalid email address. Try another email address.
auth/phone-number-already-exists: This phone number already exists. Please sign in or try another phone number.
auth/user-not-found: User not found. Sign up or enter the correct email/password
